scripts.build: npm install && mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.js *.json *.svg *.png *.jpg *.ico *.txt *.xml *.webmanifest css js assets images files downloads uploads admin dist/ || true
scripts.build:ci: npm install && mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html *.js *.json *.svg *.png *.jpg *.ico *.txt *.xml *.webmanifest css js assets images files downloads uploads admin dist/ || true
